page.title: 12Fun Day in Frogmore.
page.content: {Fun Day }is held every year. It has stalls, races and a rounders' match - Sherford against Frogmore. The races are great fun and nobody minds losing. The obstacle race is the most fun. You have to start off together and then you have to climb over a large trailer with bales of straw on, run through a gap in the hedge, run up to the bank and jump the stream, then run into the forest along the path, up to the plank bridge, walk across it, under the bridge that is made of two bales with tarpaulin over the top and then up to the finishing line. There are other races like the wheelbarrow race, sack race, running races and slow and fast bicycle races. The winners get a lolly pop or some sweets.
